remarks: The dimension theorem for vector spaces: any two bases of the same vector space are equinumerous.  Proven by using ~ lssacsex and ~ lbsacsbs to show that being a basis for a vector space is equivalent to being a basis for the associated algebraic closure system, and then using ~ acsexdimd .  (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)
statement:
lvecdim.1 $e |- J = ( LBasis ` W ) $.
lvecdim $p |- ( ( W e. LVec /\ S e. J /\ T e. J ) -> S ~~ T ) $.
